text: Ærest of usmere on heasecan beorh of ðan beorhge on cuðredes treow.
Of ðan treowe on þa dic andlang dic ðæt on sture.
Ðonne of sture ðæt eft on ða dic andlang dic ðæt on horsa broc andlang broces on cenunga ford of ðan forda utan wið ðone wudu ðæt to cynefares stane.
Of ðan stane on hoccan stige of ðære stige on on mær wylle.
Of ðæm wille on ða dic andlang dic on sture.
Of sture on mær dene andlang dene to windofre.
Of windofre on ðone stapol of ðan stapole on ðone weg.
Andlang weges in ðæt slæd of ðæm slæde on litlan dune andlang weges þæt eft on usmere.
